alert.note: Alert for Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 25 at 1:04PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM SUNDAY TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Shirley Basin. Includes the towns of Medicine Bow and Shirley Basin. * WHEN...From 2 PM Sunday to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage. People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. Use caution if you must drive.
